column4: i'm in a meeting soon at work about what linux distro we pick as our "enterprise" server distribution - and I'm keen to promote ubuntu - can any one point me in a direction of information advocating ubuntu to enterprises
the key to 'enterprise' is support.  Does UbuntuLinux Inc now provide 365 24x7 support?  I just don't know.
according to the website, Canonical do provide support
then give it a try.  Another thing to consider is hw support.
